data.meaning_mnemonic: The radical <radical>heaven</radical> is the same as the kanji <kanji>heaven</kanji>, making this an easy kanji to memorize.
data.meaning_hint: If you know your radicals well (and you should!) you know the meaning of this kanji well, as well!
data.reading_mnemonic: <kanji>Heaven</kanji>... nowadays, people aren't all that good. Things have gotten bad. That's why the acceptance rate to get into heaven is only <reading>ten</reading> (てん) percent!
data.reading_hint: Imagine yourself in line to get into heaven. You're super worried, because you're not sure if you'll get in. You heard there was a one in <reading>ten</reading> chance... those aren't good odds. Feel nervous in your imagination. Feel worried. Feel the pressure as you get closer and closer to the gate... will you make it?? Ten percent!
